OOC: Nobody's fighting because I'm still waiting for deltazero's 
response to my last battle post, which seems to have gotten lost in 
the shuffle.  Here's a quick summary of it (it's not worth the effort 
to repost entirely when there's a damn good chance it'll be ignored 
again):

-Devilcat ingnores SS's fireballs (which bounced off his shield) and 
attacks Talon with his laser sword.

-Riekan continues to go after Spike, firing both his boomerang blades 
at him.

-Torin is with the downed Jayde.
